programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP54 Mercy Mercy Me [English Dub]
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Goddess of Mercy statue.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP55 Kooky Kabuki, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP 53 A Cosmic Call
programme.desc: Sonic activates Chaos Control in his battle against Dark Oak, most formidable enemy he's faced thus far, to scatter the Emeralds across the galaxy. Meanwhile, Tails, Amy, and Cream encounter a spaceship that's crash-landed to their planet during a meteor shower.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP54 Cosmic Crisis
programme.desc: Grown up Chris returns to Sonic's world as his young twelve-year-old self, joining Sonic and his friends to stop Metarex from destroying their planet.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP55 H2 Whoa
programme.desc: As Sonic continues his journey aboard Blue Typhoon for the Chaos Emerald, they arrive on Planet Secco, a planet that's supposed to be bone dry and yet is now filled with water.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP56 Kooky Kabuki, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP57 Alter-Ego Maniac [English Dub]
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's supercomputer.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP57 Alter-Ego Maniac [English Dub]
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's supercomputer.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP58 Getting' Jigen With It [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Droplet of Aurora, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP56 An Enemy in Need
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are the guests of honour at a feast for saving the planet. Dr. Eggman, observing the celebration, begins to plot his next scheme to steal away the Chaos Emerald.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP57 A Chilling Discovery
programme.desc: Continuing the search for Chaos Emeralds, Sonic, and soon after Dr. Eggman, heads for Planet Breezy but is faced with an attack from Metarex.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP58 Desperately Seeking Sonic
programme.desc: In pursuit of Metarex who had stolen Planet egg on a jungle planet, Sonic gets thrown down to the planet. Worried Amy, Cosmo, Cream, and Cheese organize a search party in order to find Sonic.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura, and Kakashi team up with Rock Lee to escort Prince Michiru and his son Hikaru, but a villainous uprising awaits their homecoming.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E01 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E02 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E03 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress [English Subtitle]
programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E01 [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: At a time when the industrial revolution was carrying the world into the modern age, a horde of undead monsters suddenly appeared. They could not be killed unless their hearts, which were protected by a layer of iron, were pierced. Humans bitten by them would come back as undead monsters themselves. These undead, which would later be known as "Kabane," exploded in population until they finally overran the world. - - The people of Hinomoto, a nation in the far east, built fortresses known as "stations" throughout the land that have allowed them to survive the threat of the Kabane. People can only travel between these stations using fortified steam locomotives known as "Hayajiro," and they have managed to stay alive by sharing resources in this way. - - Ikoma is a young steamsmith living at Aragane Station, a city that specializes in the manufacture of iron and steam engines. He is working on developing a unique anti-Kabane weapon called a "piercing gun" as he waits for his chance to prove his strength. - - Then, one day, a Hayajiro called the "Iron Fortress" makes its way through the front lines to arrive at Aragane Station. When Ikoma begins his usual maintenance routine, he sees a mysterious girl who is exempt from her Kabane inspection. That night, Ikoma sees the girl again and learns that her name is Mumei, but then an out-of-control Hayajiro overrun by Kabane charges into Aragane Station. - - The Kabane pour out of the train into Aragane Station. Ikoma races against the flow of the panicked residents, this time determined not to run away, but to defeat the Kabane with his piercing gun!

programme.title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress [English Subtitle]
programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E02 [English Subtitle]

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 4: Hell Verse [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must travel into the depths of Hell to stop a group of vicious Sinners and save his younger sister Yuzu, unaware that his actions could bring Hell to the World of the Living.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: The Last Mission [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: The Battle Olympia begins! Gon and team attend, but The Shadow puts a deadly end to the festivities!

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E01 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura, and Kakashi team up with Rock Lee to escort Prince Michiru and his son Hikaru, but a villainous uprising awaits their homecoming.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP59 Madame Prefers Them Hand-Dipped [English Dub]
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP60 Holy Cow [English Dub]
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP61 The Yam Is Mightier Than The Sword [English Dub]
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP62 Church of the Poison Mind [English Dub]
programme.desc: Jigen and Goemon have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP59 Galactic Gumshoes
programme.desc: Chuck finds a way to teleport supplies from his world to Sonic's. When the supplies are received by Vanilla, she asks Chaotix to deliver them to Chris. Now aboard the spaceship sent also by Chuck, Chaotix are off for a special delivery.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP60 Trick Sand
programme.desc: Rouge, aboard Crimson Egg, makes a discovery of a secret room that carries a strange capsule powered by a Chaos Emerald. Much to her surprise she discovers that Shadow is hibernating inside.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP61 Ship of Doom
programme.desc: As Shadow tries to recall who Sonic and his friends when a Metarex named Scarship arrives to complete its newly assigned mission: to destroy Sonic and Dr. Eggman.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP62 An Underground Odyssey
programme.desc: Blue Typhoon has found a new planet that may harbor another Chaos Emerald. Tails, Cosmo, and Knuckles explore in search of the emerald when they come across an abandoned city.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [Japanese Audio]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP63 A Trap for a Trap! [Japanese Audio]
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!
